meanings.definition: Loved or cherished above all others.
meanings.sent1: My dearest friend always listens to me.
meanings.sent2: She keeps her dearest memories in a special box.
meanings.sent3: The dearest puppy in the litter was adopted first.
meanings.sent4: The dearest star in the sky shone brightly that night.
meanings.sent5: Her dearest possession was a worn-out teddy bear.

meanings.sent1: The dearest wish of the child was to meet a unicorn.
meanings.sent2: The dearest moments are spent with family.
meanings.sent3: The dearest cupcake in the bakery was sold out quickly.
meanings.sent4: The dearest melody in the song touched everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: His dearest dream was to travel the world.

meanings.sent1: She is my dearest, always there when I need her.
meanings.sent2: The dearest in his life is his grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The dearest at the party was the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: The dearest at the park was the friendly old man.
meanings.sent5: Her dearest is her loyal dog, Max.
